name: E.T. Exterminator
description:
You are an astronaut and you move on platforms to shoot and kill as many aliens as you can and avoid being killed! The more aliens you kill the higher your score! Highly recommended to read how to play in the game.

It would be helpful if you leave a comment on whether you enjoyed it and what I could add and improve.

Thanks! By BHS20036_IsaacYao
